#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int main() {
    
    int t, n, v, len, i, j, v1, v2;
    vector<bool> A( 100001, true );
    vector<int> B;
    vector<int> C;
    n = 100001;

    A[ 0 ] = A[ 1 ] = false;

    for( i = 2;( i * i ) <= n;i++ )
        for( j = ( i * i );j <= n;j += i )
            if( A[ j ] )
                A[ j ] = false;

    for( i = 2;i <= n;i++ )
        if( A[ i ] )
            B.push_back( i );
    
    len = B.size();

   for( i = 0;i < len - 2;i++ ) {
        
        v1 = B[ i ] + B[ i + 2 ];
        v2 = v1 / 2;
        if( v1 == ( 2 * v2 ) ) {
            if( B[ i + 1 ] == v2 )
                C.push_back( v2 );
		}
    }

/*	cout << "Array\n Length : " << C.size() << endl;
	copy( C.begin(), C.end(), ostream_iterator<int> (cout, "\n"));
	cout << endl;
*/
    scanf("%d", &t );

    while( t-- ) {
        
        scanf("%d" ,&v );
        printf("%d\n", C[ v - 1 ] );
    }

    return 0;
}
